metadata.title: CVE-2024-40937 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gve: Clear napi->skb before dev_kfree_skb_any()gve_rx_free_skb incorrectly leaves napi->skb referencing an skb after itis freed with dev_kfree_skb_any(). This can result in a subsequent callto napi_get_frags returning a dangling pointer.Fix this by clearing napi->skb before the skb is freed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
